title: engini shelvEN
sahitya:
engini shelvEn yAriDam sholvEn EnO unakku ipparAmukham rAmA


anupallavi

  shen kamala shelvi varuDum padAmbujam en kali tIrttiDum enru vaNangiya pin


caraNam    bhuviyil aDimai en pAvangaL pollAvO pAvana nAman mun parandavai shellAvO
 bhakta rakSakanennum pEr unadallavO pArinil unakkidaip-paDittu nAn shollavO
allum paghalumE shooli un nAmam kallum karaindiDak-kaNNIr malgiDum
 enranuk-kirangi en vinaiyOTTi vandATkoNDiDAmal vALAyirundiDil nAn
